item.title: By: Katie
item.dc:creator: Katie
item.description:
Hello!
It's double sided scrap booking paper. I bought this at hobbycraft, not the cheapest to be honest, but the end result is great.
Katie xx

item.title: By: Iris
item.dc:creator: Iris
item.description: Hi Katie . how do you end up with a different pattern inside and out of the heart. Is it special paper and if so where do you buy it.. Love Auntie Iris
item.content:encoded: Hi Katie . how do you end up with a different pattern inside and out of the heart. Is it special paper and if so where do you buy it.. Love Auntie Iris
